top_comments.comment: Visit https://simplisafe.com/modustrial to learn more and to get at least 30% off your SimpliSafe security system!
bit late but have a look at a kitchen working triangle

comments_since_last_sample.body: No pulls, push to open.  Very minimalist...

Mike, been watching you for a long time now. You make some pretty spectacular stuff Man!!  Building is coming along fantastically. With that being said, I vote pulls for the cabinets. Now, hear me out..... Paint them Ferrari Red!!!! Hoping all is well Bud, will prob. start commenting more often (not sure why I never really did this whole time) & Dirty Jersey out!!
In my experience the functionality of those push-to-open drawers will fade over time, I would definitely still go with the drawer pulls!

Deep drawers for storing cooking utensils and bowls etc would be best. Cabinets for those, things get lost and are hard to see. Also a double trash can drawer next to the sink or butcher block is so helpful when chopping.
Drawer pulls for sure. It will save a lot of confusion for guests etc that come over if they don't see a handle.
Just a suggestion ...when you wanna talk about camera specs ...I'd start with the resolution 😉 ...the crib is shaping up nicely
